student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-7, "Numbers 1–20." During this lesson, children will show numbers 1–20; they show the teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones. They find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known.

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-8, "Review Partners." During this lesson, children will find all the partners of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 10. They view teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones, and practice finding 10-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-8: Review Partners (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.1, K.CC.A.3, K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.4, MP3, MP6, MP7

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-9, "Partners of 6, 7, 8, and 9." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers in sequence as ten ones and extra ones and find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known. They identify partners of the numbers 6 through 9.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-9: Partners of 6, 7, 8, and 9 (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.B.4c, K.NBT.A.1, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.4, MP4, MP6, MP7

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-10, "Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game." During this lesson, children will solve addition and subtraction story problems and visualize teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones. They will use the = and ? signs in comparing.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-10: Tens in Teen Numbers: A Game (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.2, K.CC.A.3, K.CC.C.6, K.CC.C.7, K.NBT.A.1, K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.2, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.5, MP1, MP4, MP5, MP6

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-11, "Tens in Teen Numbers Book." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers as ten ones and extra ones and find 10-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-11: Tens in Teen Numbers Book (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.3, K.NBT.A.1, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.4, MP6, MP7

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-12, "Partners of 10: Class Project." During this lesson, children will relate 10-partner drawings to addition equations and find changes in the partners of ten.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-12: Partners of 10: Class Project (Practice)
student.standards: K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.2, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.4, K.OA.A.5, MP3, MP4

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-13, "Introduction to Counting and Grouping Routines." During this lesson, children will count by ones and tens to 100. They find partners of 10 and write and discuss 7-partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 3 – More Teen Numbers and Partners: Lesson 5-13: Introduction to Counting and Grouping Routines (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.1, K.CC.A.2, K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.2, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.4, MP4, MP6, MP7

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-15, "Add Partners to Find Totals." During this lesson, children will show numbers 1–20, show the teen numbers as a group of ten ones and further ones. They find the unknown partner when the total and one partner are known and find the total of the two partners.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-15: Add Partners to Find Totals (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.B.4a, K.CC.B.4c, K.CC.B.5, K.NBT.A.1, K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.2, K.OA.A.3, K.OA.A.5, MP1, MP2, MP6, MP7, MP8

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-16, "Story Problems and Comparing: Totals Through 10." During this lesson, children will tell, retell, and solve addition and subtraction stories. They also compare the number of objects in two groups and take away objects to make groups equal.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-16: Story Problems and Comparing: Totals Through 10 (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.3, K.CC.B.5, K.CC.C.6, K.CC.C.7, K.OA.A.1, K.OA.A.2, MP1, MP3, MP6, MP8

student.meaningful_description: This Practice page provides additional practice for key concepts from Lesson 5-17, "Subtract to Make Equal Groups." During this lesson, children will visualize teen numbers as ten ones and further ones. They compare the number of objects in groups and compare numbers.
student.display_title: SE: Big Idea 4 – More Story Problems and Equations: Lesson 5-17: Subtract to Make Equal Groups (Practice)
student.standards: K.CC.A.3, K.CC.B.5, K.CC.C.6, K.CC.C.7, K.NBT.A.1, MP2, MP3, MP6, MP7, MP8
